sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSACCOUNTDYNINFO where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and PROFITBRC = :profitbrc

insert into LNSACCOUNTDYNINFO (ACCTNO, ACCTSTAT, PROFITBRC, STATUS, PRDCODE, INACCTNO, OPENACCTBRC, ACCTYPE, SUBCTRLCODE, CCY, FLAG, FLAG1, REPAYORDER, RATETYPE, BALD, INTRATE, LASTBAL, CURRBAL, CTRLBAL, ACCUM, BEGINDATE, PRECHGRATEDATE, PRECALCINTDATE, NEXTCALCDATE, PRETRANDATE, DAC, BEGINCACUDATE, ENDCACUDATE, PRECACUDAYS, CACUDAYS, YEARSTARTBAL, FLAGRES11, DATERES01, DATERES02, AMOUNTRES1, AMOUNTRES2, ACCUMRES, ACCTNORES01, ACCTNORES02, ORDNU, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME) values (:acctno, :acctstat, :profitbrc, :status, :prdcode, :inacctno, :openacctbrc, :acctype, :subctrlcode, :ccy, :flag, :flag1, :repayorder, :ratetype, :bald, :intrate, :lastbal, :currbal, :ctrlbal, :accum, :begindate, :prechgratedate, :precalcintdate, :nextcalcdate, :pretrandate, :dac, :begincacudate, :endcacudate, :precacudays, :cacudays, :yearstartbal, :flagres11, :dateres01, :dateres02, :amountres1, :amountres2, :accumres, :acctnores01, :acctnores02, :ordnu, :modifydate, current timestamp)

update LNSACCOUNTDYNINFO set STATUS = :status, PRDCODE = :prdcode, INACCTNO = :inacctno, OPENACCTBRC = :openacctbrc, ACCTYPE = :acctype, SUBCTRLCODE = :subctrlcode, CCY = :ccy, FLAG = :flag, FLAG1 = :flag1, REPAYORDER = :repayorder, RATETYPE = :ratetype, BALD = :bald, INTRATE = :intrate, LASTBAL = :lastbal, CURRBAL = :currbal, CTRLBAL = :ctrlbal, ACCUM = :accum, BEGINDATE = :begindate, PRECHGRATEDATE = :prechgratedate, PRECALCINTDATE = :precalcintdate, NEXTCALCDATE = :nextcalcdate, PRETRANDATE = :pretrandate, DAC = :dac, BEGINCACUDATE = :begincacudate, ENDCACUDATE = :endcacudate, PRECACUDAYS = :precacudays, CACUDAYS = :cacudays, YEARSTARTBAL = :yearstartbal, FLAGRES11 = :flagres11, DATERES01 = :dateres01, DATERES02 = :dateres02, AMOUNTRES1 = :amountres1, AMOUNTRES2 = :amountres2, ACCUMRES = :accumres, ACCTNORES01 = :acctnores01, ACCTNORES02 = :acctnores02, ORDNU = :ordnu, MODIFYDATE = :modifydate, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and PROFITBRC = :profitbrc

select ACCTNO, ACCTSTAT, PROFITBRC, STATUS, PRDCODE, INACCTNO, OPENACCTBRC, ACCTYPE, SUBCTRLCODE, CCY, FLAG, FLAG1, REPAYORDER, RATETYPE, BALD, INTRATE, LASTBAL, CURRBAL, CTRLBAL, ACCUM, BEGINDATE, PRECHGRATEDATE, PRECALCINTDATE, NEXTCALCDATE, PRETRANDATE, DAC, BEGINCACUDATE, ENDCACUDATE, PRECACUDAYS, CACUDAYS, YEARSTARTBAL, FLAGRES11, DATERES01, DATERES02, AMOUNTRES1, AMOUNTRES2, ACCUMRES, ACCTNORES01, ACCTNORES02, ORDNU, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME from LNSACCOUNTDYNINFO where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and PROFITBRC = :profitbrc

select ACCTNO, ACCTSTAT, PROFITBRC, STATUS, PRDCODE, INACCTNO, OPENACCTBRC, ACCTYPE, SUBCTRLCODE, CCY, FLAG, FLAG1, REPAYORDER, RATETYPE, BALD, INTRATE, LASTBAL, CURRBAL, CTRLBAL, ACCUM, BEGINDATE, PRECHGRATEDATE, PRECALCINTDATE, NEXTCALCDATE, PRETRANDATE, DAC, BEGINCACUDATE, ENDCACUDATE, PRECACUDAYS, CACUDAYS, YEARSTARTBAL, FLAGRES11, DATERES01, DATERES02, AMOUNTRES1, AMOUNTRES2, ACCUMRES, ACCTNORES01, ACCTNORES02, ORDNU, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME from LNSACCOUNTDYNINFO where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT in (${acctstat}) and PROFITBRC = :profitbrc
